incoming.title: Incoming Orders
incoming.footer: {count, plural, =1 {# order} other {# orders}} waiting for review
incoming.empty: There are no incoming orders at the moment.

accepted.title: Accepted Orders
accepted.empty: You have not accepted any orders.

waiting.title: Waiting for Pickup
waiting.footer: {count, plural, =1 {# order} other {# orders}} ready for pickup
waiting.empty: All completed orders have been picked up.

finished.title: Finished Orders
finished.empty: Finished orders will show up here.
